data.name: Immortal Life Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7(SP1)/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7(SP1)/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6G
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
